C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: test
command: hadoop fs -put -f /opt/hadoop/LICENSE.txt / && hadoop fs -ls / && hadoop fs -rm /LICENSE.txt; rc=$?; echo $rc; [ $rc = 0 ]

containers.name: test
command: apk update && apk add curl && statusCode=$(curl -f -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://release-name-hdfs-namenodes:9870/webhdfs/v1?op=LISTSTATUS) && echo "${statusCode}" && [ "${statusCode}" = "200" ]
for i in $(seq 1 300); do nc -z -w3 release-name-hdfs-namenode-0.release-name-hdfs-namenodes:8021 && exit 0 || sleep 1; done; exit 1
initContainers.name: wait-for-namenode-startup

command: until nslookup gaffer-accumulo-masters; do echo Waiting on Accumulo master; sleep 2; done
initContainers.name: check-accumulo-ready

containers.name: curl
command: statusCode=-1 && until [ "${statusCode}" = "200" ] || [ $(( ATTEMPTS++ )) -gt 300 ]; do sleep 1; statusCode=$(curl -f -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://release-name-gaffer-api:80/rest/graph/status); echo "$(date) - http://release-name-gaffer-api:80/rest/graph/status : ${statusCode}"; done; [ "${statusCode}" != "200" ] && exit 1; exit 0

containers.name: cmds
command: until hadoop fs -ls / >/dev/null 2>&1 || [ $(( ATTEMPTS++ )) -gt 300 ]; do echo "$(date) - Waiting for HDFS instance to be ready..." && sleep 10; done && hadoop fs -mkdir -p /accumulo && hadoop fs -chown accumulo /accumulo && hadoop fs -chmod 700 /accumulo && hadoop fs -ls /

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
